tidybrookes

tidybrookes is designed to make it easy to extract, clean and manipulate clinical informatics data from Cambridge University Hospitals in a reliable and consistent way. It provides functions for loading, cleaning, quality checking, joining, summarising and plotting.

Installation 

# Install development version from GitHub
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("rjbgoudie/tidybrookes")

Usage

Get started with vignette("tidybrookes").
